Ask HN: IT admins, what IT tools would you like to see?
text:
My passion is the IT space. So many tools are focused on employee engagement and experience, but not enough on the IT team.

I quit my job a few months ago and in a few months I'll have to find a new one. I’m interested in building a tool so I thought I'd see if anybody had any ideas for IT tools they wanted to see that I could potentially explore before getting a new job.

Show HN: I made a small Space Shooter
text:
Thank you https://opengameart.org for your service. People like me who can't draw or compose music are in your debt.

The game, "Glitch and Rush" has been made in a few hours here and there.

I've been tinkering in GameDev for years, if not decades, but I never released anything. The goal here was simple:

  - come up with a core mechanic
  - implement a single level
  - add some polishing
  - RELEASE
I hope you'll enjoy it. BTW, my best time is 2min23s (yes, I'm bad at my own game, it's ok, I'm ok).
